GUI_client module¶

GUI_client.post_img_GUI(info)¶

The client function of posting images.

Parameters

info (dict) – The dictionary of image information.

Returns

None

GUI_client.post_process_opt(info)¶

The client function of posting processed images.

Parameters

info (dict) – The dictionary of image information.

Returns

None

GUI_client.post_user_id(info)¶

The client function of posting a new user.

Parameters

info (dict) – the dictionary of user’s information.

Returns

None

GUI_client.request_check_id(ids)¶

The client function of checking the existence of this id.

Parameters

ids (string) – the user id.

Returns

The existence of this id.

Return type

bool

GUI_client.request_history_info(ids)¶

The client function of getting user history operation list.

User information includes: (1) user id (2) the indexes of the operation (3) the timestamp when user process the imaeg(s) (4) the operation name (5) the image(s) name

Parameters

ids (string) – the user id

Returns

return the history information to client.

Return type

json

GUI_client.request_one_history_info(ids, num)¶

The client function of retrieve one of the history information

User information includes: (1) user id (2) the index of the operation (3) uploaded time of the image(s) (4) the operation name (5) the size of the image(s) (6) the CPU running time for each image processing (7) the image name(s) (8) the raw image(s) (9) the processed image(s)

Parameters

  • ids (string) – the user id

  • num (int) – get the history by providing the index of the

  • info (history) –

Returns

return the history information under this index.

Return type

json

GUI_client.request_recent_process_images(ids)¶

The client function of processing the images that just uploaded

User information includes: (1) user id (2) uploaded time of the image(s) (3) the operation name (4) the size of the image(s) (5) the CPU running time for each image processing (6) the image name(s) (7) the raw image(s) (8) the processed image(s) While user “08563” is not in the database, and we can get the expected message from server.

Returns

return information about the result of recent processed images.

Return type

json

GUI_client.request_user_info(ids)¶

The client function of getting user information.

User information includes: (1) user id (2) how many images have been uploaded (3) the total number of times of the various image processing steps.

Parameters

ids (string) – the user id

Returns

return the user information to client.

Return type

json
